name: Edgar RAMOS, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Ramos v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Edgar RAMOS, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of October, 2010, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
6 A.3d 498
Edgar RAMOS, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent.
No. 101 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 7, 2010.
